examples.example: 他完成了一项任务，接着又投入到下一项工作中。

translate.english: He completed one task and then threw himself into the next work.

examples.example: 我读完了这本书，接着又拿起了另一本有趣的书开始阅读。

translate.english: I finished reading this book, and then picked up another interesting book and started to read.

examples.example: 我打扫完客厅，接着又去整理卧室。

translate.english: I finished cleaning the living room and then went to tidy up the bedroom.
